channel.title: Michael Byrne on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Michael Byrne on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Michael Byrne: Lived Experience Trauma Support (LETS)
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan MB - Michael Byrne MM On this podcast I'm going to be speaking to the founder and MD at Lived Experience Trauma Support for mental health, Michael Byrne. He is going to be speaking about his new venture and he is going to be speaking about his own experience about mental health. A health warning. This episode describes scenes from traumatic events that listeners may find disturbing.
